name: EVRLoot
shortDescription: Dark-fantasy game https://game.evrloot.com/  pioneering intriguing lore, addictive gameplay, and deep integration of on-chain progression. All while focusing on being truly fun
description: Evrloot is an immersive experience, packaged into a low-touch game with composable RMRK NFTs at its core. Rooted in dark fantasy, inspired by classic RPGs like Diablo II or Dark Souls, Evrloot brings a world full of potential treasure, and immersive lore but also real consequences to the players. Spiced up with D&D-vibe storytelling, the lore advances with the player progressing, but also through global events altering the world for everyone at the same time.
